actions.description: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks and uses Defile (if available).
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Ordinary vegetation within 10 feet of the ssurran withers and dies. In addition, each creature within 10 feet of the ssurran must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The ssurran regains 5 (1d10) hit points for each creature that fails the saving throw.
actions.name: Defile (Recharge 6)

actions.description:
The ssurran casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)

1/day each: invisibility (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

specialTraits.description: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
specialTraits.name: Hold Breath

specialTraits.description: The ssurran's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.
specialTraits.name: Intellect Fortress
